posts.title: elkai - a TSP solver
posts.markdown:
Check out the [elkai](https://github.com/fikisipi/elkai) library.

* ⚡ running fast native code with prebuilt wheels for most platforms
* 🗺️ based on LKH by Keld Helsgaun, with proven optimal solutions up to N=315
* 🛣️ supports asymmetric distances (ATSP)
posts.desc: Check out the [elkai](https://github.com/fikisipi/elkai) library. * ⚡ running fast native code with prebuilt wheels for most platforms * 🗺️ based on LKH by Keld Helsgaun, with proven optimal solutions
